snippet: Some of the luxury house’s watchmaking artisans now work together in a renovated farmhouse in the Swiss countryside.
abstract: Cartier has converted 1872 Swiss farmhouse into Maison des Metiers d’Art, communal work space for artisans, craftspeople, engineers and others who create limited-edition watches; project is intended to preserve specialized techniques as well as foster creativity and innovation.
lead_paragraph: Some of the luxury house’s watchmaking artisans now work together in a renovated farmhouse in the Swiss countryside.

headline.main: The House That Cartier Skill Built
headline.print_headline: For Artisans at Cartier Change Begins at Home
